extendedInfo.description: All in one of Drinking game!Mini games for drinking and Drinking game list!Have fun drinking with this application**** Functions ****Bomb game, Up and Down, Roulette game, Paper lotto, Drinking game manual, Multi-language support!Bomb game - We do not know when the bomb is exploded! The one who is grabbing the phone. Drink it up :)Up and Down - Between 1 to 99. There is one number that you will encounter. Then... Drink it up :)Roulette game - Choose the number that you want. And if the roulette indicates your number. Congratulation! So Drink it up :)Paper lotto - Pick the paper. There is a blank one and a lucky one. Did you pick the lucky one? Congratulation! So Drink it up :)*Drinking game manual - It also has lists of drinking game! So you do not have to look at your smart-phone forever!*Multi-language support - Currently, it supports Korean and English only. But more language will be added!*** And translation of the list of drinking game might be a little awkward. Sorry for your inconvenience. I am working on it! Feedback is always welcome :)iwhatthei@gmail.comhttp://twitter.com/@JeiToTheKeiDrinking game / Drink game / Shots / Bomb game / Up and down / Roulette / Paper lotto / Drinking game list /

reviews.comment: All in Japanese.  I could not future it out. Deleted it.
reviews.author: A Google User
